<template>
    <BaseFormField :title="title" :error="error">
        <input class="form__input" v-model="dataValue" :type="text" :placeholder="placeholder">
    </BaseFormField>
</template>

<script>
import formFieldMixin from '@/mixins/formFieldMixin';

export default {
    props: ['type'],
    mixins: [formFieldMixin]
}
</script>
